title: Catherine Cohen | Trump Says He'd Threaten to Use Nuclear Weapons Against Russia: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Donald Trump saying he would threaten to use nukes against Russia while right-wing conspiracy theories about the country’s invasion of Ukraine spin wildly out of control.

Then, Catherine Cohen talks about her comedy special The Twist?... She's Gorgeous, growing up in Texas and performing live comedy.
